2013, the SMGL partners conducted a 
second retrospective data collection to 
identify all deaths of WRA during Phase 1. 
Zambia did not have a community-based 
system to collect health data in place before 
the SMGL initiative began. It set up a new 
system of community key informants, who 
tracked each pregnant woman until the end 
of the 42-day postpartum period. However, 
logistical challenges limited the coverage
